tweet: Here’s how to gain up to 10% yield on your #Cardano holdings: 1. Delegate your tokens to a stake pool. 2. Pool uses tokens to validate transactions & add blocks to Cardano #blockchain. 3. Pool earns #ADA rewards for this. 4. Rewards are shared proportionately among pool members.

#Cardano recently rolled out #Shelley Testnet for users holding #ADA tokens in #Yoroi or #Daedalus wallet at the time of snapshot. Shelley transforms Cardano into a proper, functioning, globally decentralized, PoS #cryptocurrency.
@RichardMcCrackn @InputOutputHK @emurgo_io @Cardano Was this really a necessary tweet rick?

A word of warning: If someone asks for your #ADA “in order to stake,” they’re probably trying to steal your money.  #crypto #Cardano #altcoins #cryptocurrency

Day 5 Testnet Staking  22.4% of all $ADA in existence has been staked (was 21%) 356 active pools (was 339 & more still coming online) 19.6m average tADA per pool (was 19.3m)  Remember this is a TEST environment so bugs are normal  Patience & keep up the great work everyone!  🤘₳

With the ability to delegate $ada to a pool, #Cardano network users can pay transaction fees through staking rewards. So they have a chance to use the network essentially for free. You must always pay for transactions,  but this way is very user-friendly.  #blockchain #crypto  https://t.co/4Y3fTAGNdX

Help me understand why anyone would want to stake with an exchange?  I would much rather stake myself (my🔑my ₳) & pay a small "tax" to delegate to a community member who is actively invested in the success of Cardano.  Staking w/an exchange just feels like traditional banking👎

If you are considering giving a digital currency #Cardano $ada to someone for Christmas, the best option is a paper wallet. It's something graspable, it can be held for a long time, and it's safe at the same time.  Merry Christmas!  https://t.co/k2BQgQLe4f

Points of Interest related to #Cardano test-net  - A total of 481 pools are registered - Only 105 pools are able to produce rewards, while the rest of pools is running but the people who deal with them do not get any ADA - A total of 11% of all stake is delegated to zombie pools  https://t.co/SIfeZwVmYV

412 #StakePools now showing up on the #Daedelus Testnet Wallet. Well above the 100 pools that were expected for the testnet. #Cardano is just getting going. Looking forward to the mainnet in 2020 along with some better marketing from the new engagement with McCanns   #ada #crypto
